title: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Chervone, Novodanylivka, Mali Scherbaky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian a...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Poltavka, Chervone, Novodanylivka, Mali Scherbaky of Zaporizhzhia region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Malynivka of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
